A psalm written by Asaph for the choir director, to be accompanied by stringed instruments
There he broke the flaming arrows
their shields and swords and other weapons that they used in battles.
were killed, and then those who killed them
took away everything that those soldiers had.
they were unable to use their weapons
When you, the God whom Jacob
horses and their riders fell down dead.
But you cause everyone to be afraid.
From heaven you proclaimed that you would judge people,
the earth was afraid and did not say
when you arose to declare that you would punish
and rescue all those whom they had oppressed.
with whom you are angry, your people will praise you,
who ◄survive/are not killed► will worship you on your festival days.
give to Yahweh the offerings that you promised to give to him;
all the people of nearby people-groups should also bring gifts to him, the one who is awesome.
